I got it working by doing this:

Step 1. Go to the start menu -> run or windows+r and type "cmd" (no quotes) and hit enter.
Step 2. Type the following or paste it by right clicking and hitting paste.

    bcdedit.exe/set nx AlwaysOff

Now hit enter.

Step 3. Reboot your computer and now try installing the game again.

After the installation is complete, go ahead and re-enable DEP if it was enabled before. If it was already disabled, don't worry about it unless you want to have it. It is your call.

Step 4. Bring up the start menu -> run (or start+r) and type in "cmd" (no quotes) again and hit enter.
Step 5. This type type or right click -> paste the following:

    bcdedit.exe/set nx OptIn

Now hit enter.
Step 6. Reboot and continue on with your life. The game should be good to go now.

Okay So. Here goes some simple directions for you folks all wtf and whatever..

1. You take the rar files and you unrar them into the folder of your choice. This will give you a single .iso file.

2. Open the .iso file using Magic ISO or any iso software of your choice. 

3. In the folder you will see Setup.exe. Press it and it will install the game to your system. (There's a weird video that loops during installation and it's quite trippy)

4. Next go to the ISO folder again and find the Crack folder Open that folder and you should see

Bond.EXE
Bond update bla bla bla
rld.dll

5. IMPORTANT: Before you crack the file you must update the game using the bond update (second file) So press that and it will pop up some window and say.. Done! I believe.

6. Go to your direcory. ie Computer/Program Files/Activision etc.. Wherever you installed the actual game to. Once you have updated the original bond.exe, now you can go ahead and crack the file.

7. To crack the file, Take the bond.exe from the Crack folder and place it in the installed game directory and say copy/replace.

8. Also! Take the rld.dll file in the Cracks folder and again copy to the installed game directory.

9. Once you have done this in the order described, you should be able to play the game.

10. If you have black screen, laggy graphics etc, it's not reloaded's fault, your computer graphics card or your single core processor suck and you need to make some upgrades. And this will cost money.

11. Enjoy the game

Thank you RELOADED for several fun filled years.
